abstract: The bank confirms negotiations, and a deal with Capital One Financial for the $30 billion portfolio is said to be near.
snippet: The bank confirms negotiations, and a deal with Capital One Financial for the $30 billion portfolio is said to be near.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings said on Tuesday that it was in talks over the sale of its credit card business in the United States.

headline.main: HSBC in Talks to Sell Credit Card Portfolio

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
